name: Intro
_source: speak;Marisa;Tch, up ahead. There they are.
speak;Mima;It appears they're dead set on not letting us pass.
speak;Marisa;Lady Mima, what do you think we should do?
speak;Mima;Can't go around. We'll have to break through.
speak;Kasen;Tch, she's right. Scouts can't find any good way past this blockade.
speak;Reimu;Heh, perfect for me. Let's roll these guys.
speak;Marisa;What's she doing with those bastards?
speak;Kasen;Probably cut a deal or something.
speak;Reimu;One day's friend, another day's enemy...
speak;Kasen;Hmmm. I don't know why she'd work with those guys. She doesn't seem like the type, but I'd|imagine we'll find out soon enough.
speak;Kasen;She'll still be a tricky one to deal with.
speak;Reimu;Doesn't matter. I'd rather not waste time, so let's get going.
speak;Mima;(Still as brash and unfriendly as ever...)
speak;Marisa;Did you say something, Lady Mima?
speak;Alice_Boss;So, do we have a deal?
speak;Mamizou;Yup. I'll go trouble the youngsters over there, and you'll leave us alone for now.
speak;Alice_Boss;I don't know why the Lady is asking us to work with you lot.
speak;Mamizou;Oh ho ho. I don't know either, but a deal is a deal.
speak;Alice_Boss;Don't even think of backstabbing us.
speak;Mamizou;Ho ho! I wouldn't even imagine the thought.
speak;Alice_Boss;Keh. The locals here are just as untrustworthy as back then...
